snippet: Beau Biden, the son of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., is scheduled to be released from a Houston hospital on Thursday after undergoing unspecified tests, according to a statement from the vice president’s office.
abstract: Beau Biden, the son of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., is scheduled to be released from a Houston hospital on Thursday after undergoing unspecified tests, according to a statement from the vice president’s office.

headline.main: Biden's Son to Be Released From Houston Hospital
